MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:02AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the underground cable faults affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM via generators. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03 PM on Sunday, 28 March 2021
